name: iSale Auction
summary: Learn about .ISALE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create an ISALE file, select File → New Auction → With Template or Without Template. Your auction will now appear in your selected library.
To import your auction, select File → Import → Auction..., navigate to your file, and click Open.
To export your auction, select File → Export → Auction..., choose the save location, and click Save.

description: File created by iSale, a program that helps you sell items through eBay; contains an auction; includes information such as the layout, eBay site location, category, duration, payment options, shipping method, and starting price.
